query.name: com.txoof.brightspace.enroll.c08_guardian_schl_lrnr
query.sql:
/* Add parents to special school org units as Learners. The schools run parallel to thier children's school enrollment. Adding parents as "Learners" allows intelligent agents to pick them up and auto-enroll in training courses and library courses */ select distinct 'enrollment' as "type", 'UPDATE' as "action", 'P_'||GUARDIAN.GUARDIANID as "child_code", 'Learner' as "role_name", 'P_'||students.schoolid as "parent_code" from GUARDIAN GUARDIAN, COURSES COURSES, SECTIONS SECTIONS, STUDENTS STUDENTS, CC CC, GUARDIANSTUDENT GUARDIANSTUDENT, TERMS TERMS where GUARDIANSTUDENT.STUDENTSDCID=STUDENTS.DCID and STUDENTS.ID=CC.STUDENTID and CC.SECTIONID=SECTIONS.ID and TERMS.id = cc.termid and SECTIONS.COURSE_NUMBER=COURSES.COURSE_NUMBER and GUARDIANSTUDENT.GUARDIANID=GUARDIAN.GUARDIANID and STUDENTS.ENROLL_STATUS =0 and STUDENTS.GRADE_LEVEL >= 5 /* Explicitly only include guardianstudent.guardianrelationshiptypeid of type 10, 20.
As of Jan 2023 we can only reliably create parent accounts that appear on the Admissions Screen in PowerSchool SIS under the mother/father contact details.
It may be possible to improve this when moving to the PS SIS Contacts feature
*/ and guardianstudent.guardianrelationshiptypeid in(10, 20) and CC.TERMID >= case when (EXTRACT(month from sysdate) >= 1 and EXTRACT(month from sysdate) <= 6) THEN (EXTRACT(year from sysdate)-2000+9)*100 when (EXTRACT(month from sysdate) >= 7 and EXTRACT(month from sysdate) <= 12) THEN (EXTRACT(year from sysdate)-2000+10)*100 end /* Only pull courses with firstday that is lessthan or equal to the current date. This prevents adding enrolments changes that are not tracked by powerschool; changes are only tracked on or after the first day of the course. */ and trunc(terms.firstday) <= trunc(sysdate) order by "parent_code" asc
